tweet: The progress of #Chrysalis for #IOTA is absolutely amazing. We broke the 1000TPS mark, with transactions confirming in 10secs. After more testing and finishing the audit, it will come on the mainnet. (FYI, the visualization is at a lower TPS, but beautiful to watch)  https://t.co/f0pT1OZ7QK
